nanomsg

Interface ISocket

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BusSocket, PairSocket, PubSocket, PullSocket, PushSocket, RepSocket, ReqSocket, Socket, SubSocket

    public interface ISocket
    Common interface that should implement all sockets.
